markdownRemark.html: This is the most recent 18 hole course to open in the province of Almería. It is located between El Parador and Enix, very close to the Almería-Adra highway and a 25 minute drive from Almeria. The layout of the golf course has been designed for players who want to enjoy a pleasant round of golf rather than one fraught with difficulty and complications.

frontmatter.title: La Envía Golf
frontmatter.description: La Envía Golf - This is the most recent 18 hole course to open in the province of Almería. It is located between El Parador and Enix, very close to the Almería-Adra highway and a 25 minute drive from Almeria. The layout of the golf course has been designed for players who want to enjoy a pleasant round of golf rather than one fraught with difficulty and complications.
frontmatter.address: Avenida de La Envía nº 45 04727 Almería, Spain, Spain
frontmatter.price: Highest green fee weekdays 50.00 euro, Highest green fee weekends 50.00 euros
